Pre-Game Insights: The Kansas City Royals and Pittsburgh Pirates meet Saturday in MLB action from PNC Park. This will be the second installment in a three-game series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is set to take place at 1:05 pm (PNC Park).
Mitch Keller (11-9) (3.85) will pitch for the Pirates, while Michael Wacha (12-7) (3.34) will start for the Royals.
Others: The article provides betting odds and player propositions, as well as recent performance stats for both teams.
